name: @ewise/aegisjs
description: Open source library for interacting with eWise Systems' Aegis 2.0 architecture

scripts.clean: rimraf dist .nyc_output coverage coverage_unit coverage_integration mocha_unit_test_results.xml mocha_integration_test_results.xml
scripts.test: npm run test:u && npm run test:i
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run bundle -- --mode=production
scripts.artifice:unit: npm run test:unit -- -- --reporter=xunit --reporter-options output=mocha_unit_test_results.xml && nyc report --report-dir coverage_unit
scripts.artifice:integration: npm run test:integration -- -- --reporter=xunit --reporter-options output=mocha_integration_test_results.xml && nyc report --report-dir coverage_integration
scripts.artifice: npm run lint && npm run artifice:unit && npm run artifice:integration

author: Rene Calunsag Jr
